summary: Changes the appearance of Lydia with my personal character, Elaine Hellsing. Standalone version available.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the appearance of Lydia with my personal character, Elaine Hellsing. 

This is an early version, consider it alpha. Please, post any problems and I will see if I can fix them. 
Standalone version can be found in Dragonsreach. Requires SG Hair Packs, no exceptions!

If you want her to look the same as the screenshots:

Hair:
